stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance weyland-consortium cards in your deck. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Search R&D for an operation and play it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for an operation and play it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
title: Consulting Visit
